Package btrplace.solver.choco.view

Choco implementation of the model views.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AliasedCumulatives
    An interface to specify a cumulatives constraint when a resource is shared among multiple nodes.
    ChocoModelViewBuilder
    The builder that is used by ModelViewMapper to create the solver-side builder from from an api-side model.
    ChocoView
    Interface denoting the Choco implementation of a View.
    Cumulatives
    Interface to specify a multi-dimension cumulatives constraints.
    CumulativesBuilder
    Abstract builder for Cumulatives.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCumulatives
    Basic for scheduling constraints related to resource management.
    CPowerView
    A solver-side view to store variables that indicate the moment a node is powered on or off.
    CShareableResource
    Specify, for a given resource, the physical resource usage associated to each server, and the virtual resource usage consumed by each of the VMs they host.
    CShareableResource.Builder
    Builder associated to the constraint.
    DefaultAliasedCumulatives
    Builder to create constraints where slices have to be placed on nodes with regards to the slice and the nodes capacity.
    DefaultAliasedCumulatives.Builder
    Builder associated to this constraint.
    DefaultCumulatives
    Builder to create a unique slices scheduler that aggregates different resources.
    DefaultCumulatives.Builder
    Builder associated to this constraint.
    DefaultPacking
    Default implementation that relies on the pack constraint bundled with Choco.
    DefaultPacking.Builder
    Builder associated to this constraint.
    DelegatedBuilder
    Kind of a builder that is used when ChocoModelViewBuilder cannot instantiate SolverViewBuilder out of the box.
    ModelViewMapper
    A mapper to associate an ChocoView to a ModelView.
    Packing
    An abstract constraint to create vector packing constraints.
    SolverViewBuilder
    To build solver-side views.
    SolverViewsManager
    A tool to manage views according to their dependencies.

Package btrplace.solver.choco.view Description

Choco implementation of the model views.
